Dialogue Context: User: Who invented photography? Agent: Nic\u00e9phore Ni\u00e9pce, Henry Fox Talbot and Louis Daguerre are the inventors. User: When did color photography arrise? Agent: Do you want to know the time it was first attempted or the foundation method was proposed or the first photograph was made? User: Actually, what is the foundation method?
Response: Do you want to know the name of the foundation method, what the method entails, or the history of its development?
Evidence Paragraph First Sentence 1: The foundation of all practical color processes, the three-color method was first suggested in an 1855 paper by Scottish physicist James Clerk Maxwell, with the first color photograph produced by Thomas Sutton for a Maxwell lecture in 1861.[1][2]
Evidence Paragraph First Sentence 2: It is based on the Young–Helmholtz theory that the normal human eye sees color because its inner surface is covered with millions of intermingled cone cells of three types: in theory, one type is most sensitive to the end of the spectrum we call "red", another is more sensitive to the middle or "green" region, and a third which is most strongly stimulated by "blue".
Evidence Paragraph First Sentence 3: In his studies of color vision, Maxwell showed, by using a rotating disk with which he could alter the proportions, that any visible hue or gray tone could be made by mixing only three pure colors of light – red, green and blue – in proportions that would stimulate the three types of cells to the same degrees under particular lighting conditions.[3]

Evidence Paragraph First Sentence 2: List of foods associated with Halloween:
Evidence Paragraph First Sentence 3: In Ireland and Scotland, items would be hidden in food – usually a cake, barmbrack, cranachan, champ or colcannon – and portions of it served out at random.

Evidence Paragraph First Sentence 3: Abiogenic methane is stored in rocks and soil stems from the geologic processes that convert ancient biomass into fossil fuels.[clarification needed][contradictory]

Our Comment: Please select only one paragraph as the evidence for your response. This is because each of them can indicate that WWII contributes to the end of Great Depression. However, if you include different details mentioned exclusively in each paragraph, then you can include all of them as your evidence. It is important to not label redundant or repetitive paragraphs. Let's say your response contains information A and B. You find paragraph 1 containing A, paragraph 2 containing both A and B and paragraph 3 containing C only. In this case, you should ONLY label paragraph 2 as the single evidence paragraph.

Evidence Page Title 1: Great Depression in the United States
Evidence Paragraph First Sentence 1: The economy in America was now beginning to show signs of recovery and the unemployment rate was lowering following the abysmal year of 1938.
Evidence Page Title 2: Great Depression in the United States
Evidence Paragraph First Sentence 2: The need for these war materials created a huge spurt in production, thus leading to a promising level of employment in America.
Evidence Page Title 3: Great Depression in the United States
Evidence Paragraph First Sentence 3: By the end of 1941, before American entry into the war, defense spending and military mobilization had started one of the greatest booms in American history thus ending the last traces of unemployment.[70]
